title: Understanding Dysfunctional Relationships
text: A dysfunctional relationship often involves patterns that are harmful or unhealthy. Think about what behaviors might contribute to such a relationship.

hintAnswer: unhealthy behavior patterns exist among members of a group. These patterns can include poor communication styles, conflict between people in the relationship, and even emotional and/or physical abuse
title: Identifying Unhealthy Patterns
text: Consider the types of behaviors that might be present in a dysfunctional relationship. What are some common characteristics?
choices: unhealthy behavior patterns exist among members of a group. These patterns can include poor communication styles, conflict between people in the relationship, and even emotional and/or physical abuse
